name: Find Your Assassin
description:
Hide (And then kill) An Assassin with advanced AI.

Find your Assassin is  a game where you are hunted by an Assassin. You must find and activate 20 levers before finding a gun. Escape before the Assassin does, or kill the Assassin to ensure victory.

Anyways, have fun, and my number one tip is:

To take it slow.

I used Jobo's lighting (FOSS) for this project, besides that, I made all the code, art and music.

Uploaded for Brackeys 2022 game jam.

Jobo's Lighting:

https://marketplace.yoyogames.com/assets/7820/lighting-system-2d

Made in Gamemaker.
